InstitutionName: University of Pittsburgh School of Medicine
Instructions: We asked our participants to “Keep eyes open and focus on the centered plus-sign. Let your mind wander, trying not to think about anything in particular and let your thoughts flow freely.”
TaskDescription: In this resting task, participants were asked to let their mind wander while focusing on a fixation point. The fixation point was a plus-sign projected onto a screen in the MEG recording room about 1 meter from the participant.
